snippet: The playoffs will reunite the Rangers’ Brad Richards and Martin St. Louis with a former teammate, the Flyers’ Vincent Lecavalier. The three formed the core of the Lightning’s 2004 championship team.
abstract: Brad Richards, Martin St Louis and Vincent Lecavalier were integral to the Tampa Bay Lightning’s Stanley Cup run in 2004; trio will be together on the ice again during the first round of the Stanley Cup playoffs, but this time with Richards and St Louis in New York Rangers uniforms and Lecavalier playing for Philadelphia Flyers.
lead_paragraph: The playoffs will reunite the Rangers’ Brad Richards and Martin St. Louis with a former teammate, the Flyers’ Vincent Lecavalier. The three formed the core of the Lightning’s 2004 championship team.

headline.main: In a Reunion, 2 Rangers and a Flyer Recall Glory
